description.p: Open Source Flash SWF decompiler and editor. Extract resources, convert SWF to FLA, edit ActionScript, replace images, sounds, texts or fonts. Various output formats available. Works with Java on Linux, Windows and macOS.

screenshot.caption: ActionScript 2 decompilation and its P-code view
ActionScript 3 decompilation and its P-code view

Text fields editation, search and replace text
Adding new AS1/2 script to the SWF file
